Text: As Donald Trump poses on the steps of a church holding a Bible, Christians everywhere try to recall the bit where it advocates using tear gas on peaceful protestors for a photo op.
BREAKING: Latest ONS data shows the number of deaths involving #covid19 up to 22nd May was 43,837 in England and Wales. That's around 10,000 higher than government data suggested at the time.
Dear fundamentalist Christian Trump supporters: If Obama had held the Bible backwards and upside down, you would immediately have called him the Antichrist.
